channel.title: windows on Hauke Jung
channel.description: Recent content in windows on Hauke Jung

item.title: Open Windows Terminal here
item.description: The new Windows terminal (wt.exe) is very useful. At the moment i use it as my default terminal. It annoys me that there is currently no official way to start it directly from the right click context menu. So I want to show you how I solved this problem for me.
